rows.label: tlk70000122_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Are you tourists?
Hm, no, not from the looks of you...
You're adventurers or Drivers, right?

rows.label: tlk70000122_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Well then! Hope you're ready to hear
some tips from a pro adventurer!
That's me, by the way...

rows.label: tlk70000122_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you're Drivers, you'll stop from
time to time to camp on the road...

rows.label: tlk70000122_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Take the opportunity to use the
materials you've collected to create
new items!

rows.label: tlk70000122_01_msg0005
rows.name:
You can also use the food, charms
and talismans you make for a variety
of short-term boosts during battle!

rows.label: tlk70000122_01_msg0006
rows.name:
So? That's a pretty useful tip, isn't it?
If you need more, just come any time
and ask this pro adventurer! Ahem, me.
